description: With a look that can go straight from the office to the golf course, our Men’s Short Sleeve Button Down is made for comfort. Its regular fit lets you move freely without bulk, and it brings the benefits of responsibly sourced Merino wool: moisture management, odor resistance, and temperature regulation. And because the fabric is blended with recycled polyester, it’ll dry quickly and last. The next time you need to up your style yet still be casual, take this button down out for a spin.
name: Smartwool Button Down SS - Mens
